title: MAWATHAGAMA 20ft MAIN ROAD FACING LAND
details:
This may be the final chance to buy a 9.7 perches commercial land located in Mawathagama facing to Kurunegala-Kandy main road and in front of MAMA BATHKADE 300m from The Kshatriya Villa towards Kandy .

Clear deed.
Water
Electricity
Near to Mawathagama Export Zone.

### Note: NO MORE lands available facing road in between Paragahadeniya and Mawathagama ###May Contact me through WatsApp or Viber##Genuine Buyers only##No Brokers##.
